ProcessTemplates.Name: Shopify to Salesforce - Products and prices
ProcessTemplates.Description: This process will retrieve sales products and their prices from Shopify. It will perform the necessary mapping to Salesforce sales product format. Then it will transfer the mapped sales products and their prices to Salesforce.
